title: Budapest Honvéd FC in European football
text:
<a href="Budapest%20Honv%C3%A9d%20FC">Budapest Honvéd Football Club</a> is a professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Budapest">Budapest</a>, Hungary.
